actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Paul Sakwa.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to a named individual a specified sum equal to compensation which such individual would have earned as a Foreign Service Reserve officer, minus earned income from other sources, for a specified period after having been improperly forced to resign. Declares such individual entitled to specified retirement benefits under the Foreign Service Retirement and Disability System.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Paul Sakwa.
